## HttpResourcesRequestHandler type

Extended version of [RequestHandler](./opensearch-dashboards.requesthandler.md) having access to [HttpResourcesServiceToolkit](./opensearch-dashboards.httpresourcesservicetoolkit.md) to respond with HTML or JS resources.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type HttpResourcesRequestHandler<P = unknown, Q = unknown, B = unknown> = RequestHandler<P, Q, B, 'get', OpenSearchDashboardsResponseFactory & HttpResourcesServiceToolkit>;
```
<b>References:</b> [RequestHandler](./opensearch-dashboards.requesthandler.md)<!-- -->, [OpenSearchDashboardsResponseFactory](./opensearch-dashboards.opensearchdashboardsresponsefactory.md)<!-- -->, [HttpResourcesServiceToolkit](./opensearch-dashboards.httpresourcesservicetoolkit.md)
